logs.clearLogConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to clear this log? This can't be undone.
logs.clearLogsConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to clear these logs? This can't be undone.
logs.clearLogsConfirmationNum_one: Are you sure you want to clear {count} log
logs.clearLogsConfirmationNum_other: Are you sure you want to clear {count} logs
logs.clearAllLogsConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to clear all logs? This can't be undone.

integrations.reauthenticateOtherClient: We've noticed you have cloud integrations enabled in another client! Due to limitations, you will need to re-authenticate to continue using them. Click here to go to the settings page to do so!

settings.updatedRemote: Your settings have been updated! Click here to restart to fully apply changes!
settings.apiReject: Could not synchronize settings to cloud (API returned {e}).
settings.failedToSync: Could not synchronize settings to the cloud ({e}).
settings.accountChanged: Cloud sync was disabled because this account isn't connected to the cloud App. You can enable it again by connecting this account in Cloud Settings. (note: it will store your preferences separately)
settings.noSettings: There are no settings in the cloud.
settings.upToDate: Your settings are up to date.
settings.newerThanCloud: Your local settings are newer than the cloud ones.
settings.updated: Your settings have been updated! Click here to restart to fully apply changes!
settings.syncFromCloud: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud ({e}).
settings.apiEraseAll: Could not erase all data (API returned {e}), please contact support.

settingsSync.imported: Settings successfully imported. Restart to apply changes!

contributorCard.description: Since you've contributed to Equicord you now have a cool new badge!
contributorCard.subtitle: Thank you for contributing!
contributorCard.title: Contributions

donated.vencordDescription: All Vencord users can see your badge! You can manage your perks by messaging @{v}.
donated.equicordDescription: All Equicord users can see your badge! You can manage your perks by making a ticket in Equicord's server.
donated.description: All Vencord users can see your Vencord donor badge, and Equicord users can see your Equicord donor badge. To change your Vencord donor badge, contact @vending.machine. For your Equicord donor badge, make a ticket in Equicord's server.
donated.subtitle: Thank you for donating!
donated.title: Donations

notDonated.description: Please consider supporting the development of Equicord by donating!
notDonated.title: Support the Project

failedToRender: Failed to render the {tab} tab. If this issue persists, try using the installer to reinstall!

disableMinSize.title: Disable minimum window size
disableMinSize.description: Allow the Discord window to be resized smaller than its default minimum size. Useful for tiling window managers or small screens.

enableReactDevtools.title: Enable React Developer Tools
enableReactDevtools.description: Enable the React Developer Tools extension for debugging Discord's React components. Useful for plugin development.

frameless.title: Disable the window frame
frameless.description: Remove the native window frame for a cleaner look. You can still move the window by dragging the title bar area.

settings.hint: Hint: You can change the position of this settings section in the <0>settings of the Settings plugin</0>!

contributorInfo.noPlugins: This person has not made any plugins. They likely <0>contributed</0> to Equicord in other ways!

plugins.requiredToFunction: This plugin is required for Equicord to function

newPluginsSection.recentlyAddedPlugins: The following plugins have been added in recent updates:

changelog.loggedCommits: Logged commits from your latest update
changelog.upToDateLocalCopy: Repository is up to date with your local copy
changelog.checkYourConnection: Failed to connect to repository. Check your internet connection
changelog.failedtoFetchCommits: Could not fetch commits from repository
changelog.whereUpdatesFetch: This is the GitHub repository where Equicord fetches updates from
changelog.viewRecentChanges: These are the new commits and plugin updates since your last version. You can see what features were added, bugs were fixed, and which plugins received updates
changelog.checkYourInternet: Make sure you have an internet connection and try again
changelog.emptyChangelog: No commits available ahead of your current version. Click "Fetch from Repository" to check for new changes
changelog.previousSessions: A history of your previous update sessions with their commit history and plugin changes. Click on a log to expand it and see the details
changelog.info: Check the repository for new commits, plugin updates, and code changes. This will compare your current version with the latest available and show you what's new
changelog.title: Changelog

restartRequired.body: A restart is required to apply this change
restartRequired.title: Restart Required
restartRequired.plugins: The following plugins require a restart:

settings.title: Settings

transparent.description: Make the Discord window transparent. A theme that supports transparency is required or this will do nothing.
transparent.title: Enable window transparency
transparent.noteWindows: This will stop the window from being resizable and prevents you from snapping the window to screen edges
transparent.note: This will stop the window from being resizable.

useQuickCss.description: Load custom CSS from the QuickCSS editor. This allows you to customize Discord's appearance with your own styles.
useQuickCss.title: Enable Custom CSS

winCtrlQ.title: Register Ctrl+Q as shortcut to close Discord
winCtrlQ.description: Add Ctrl+Q as a keyboard shortcut to close Discord. This provides an alternative to Alt+F4 for quickly closing the application.

winNativeTitleBar.title: Use Windows' native title bar instead of Discord's custom one
winNativeTitleBar.description: Replace Discord's custom title bar with the standard Windows title bar. This may improve compatibility with some window management tools.
